Package cams.suggestion.suggester_controllers

Interface SuggesterController

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommitteeSuggesterController
public interface SuggesterController
The SuggesterController interface defines methods that allow users with suggester roles to submit, edit, and delete suggestions related to a specific camp, as well as retrieve a list of suggestions.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean delete​(User user, int postIndex)
    Deletes an existing suggestion submitted by the user.
    boolean edit​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String content)
    Edits the content of an existing suggestion submitted by the user.
    java.util.List<Post> getSuggestions​(User user)
    Retrieves a list of suggestions submitted by the user.
    boolean submit​(java.lang.String camp, User user, java.lang.String text)
    Submits a new suggestion related to a specific camp.

  • Method Details

    • submit

      boolean submit​(java.lang.String camp, User user, java.lang.String text)
      Submits a new suggestion related to a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The name of the camp for which the suggestion is submitted.
      user - The user submitting the suggestion.
      text - The content of the submitted suggestion.
      Returns:
      true if the submission is successful, false otherwise.

    • edit

      boolean edit​(User user, int postIndex, java.lang.String content)
      Edits the content of an existing suggestion submitted by the user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user editing the suggestion.
      postIndex - The index of the suggestion to be edited.
      content - The new content for the suggestion.
      Returns:
      true if the edit is successful, false otherwise.

    • delete

      boolean delete​(User user, int postIndex)
      Deletes an existing suggestion submitted by the user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user deleting the suggestion.
      postIndex - The index of the suggestion to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise.

    • getSuggestions

      java.util.List<Post> getSuggestions​(User user)
      Retrieves a list of suggestions submitted by the user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user requesting their list of suggestions.
      Returns:
      A List of Post objects representing suggestions.
